feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens, colons, and quotation marks in a similar manner.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the analysis of all features, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
